boardgame.description: What are these strange symbols on the map? They are code for locations where spies must contact secret agents!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two rival spymasters know the agent in each location. They deliver coded messages telling their field operatives where to go for clandestine meetings. Operatives must be clever. A decoding mistake could lead to an unpleasant encounter with an enemy agent _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; or worse, with the assassin! Both teams race to contact all their agents, but only one team can win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Codenames: Pictures differs from the original Codenames in that the agents are no longer represented by a single word, but by an image that contains multiple elements._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

**ANY GAME I HAVE LISTED IS STILL FOR SALE, NO MATTER WHEN I’VE LISTED IT** This game has been demonstrated once*. It is in perfect condition. It weighs 2 pounds and will be shipped via USPS, so you can check rates from 68108. * For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demonstrated. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. Feel free to check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I charge actual shipping, so combining items will typically save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4300 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well - check out my feedback! You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box.
